chapter.title: Authors
chapter.para:
For more information on Gtranslator, please visit the project website at http://gtranslator.sf.net. Bug reports should be made using the Bugzilla of GNOME site
http://bugzilla.gnome.org/enter_bug.cgi?product=gtranslator
This manual was written by Ignacio Casal Quinteiro. Please send all comments and suggestions regarding this manual to Gtranslator Devel list gtranslator-list@gnome.org.
